title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content: ough the Grand Mausoleum. To reach the Gauntlet of Shar, go through the iron fence, and you’ll hear a talking skull telling you to beat it, but it won’t do anything else if you interact with it. A part of Ketheric Thorm’s diary sits near his diseased wife’s coffin. Other parts as scattered around this area if you want to look into his past. In the eastern area of this first area, you can find a locked Traveller’s Chest at (X:-259, Y:-882). It has a lockpicking DC of 14 and contains the Vivacious
